text: Answer: 28 Solution: The average amount of data each station is transmitting: 512 x 8 = 4096 bits 4996 — 8192 bits/second Max channel bandwidth for pure ALOHA is 18.2% of channel bandwidth: 128 Kbps x18.4% = 23.552 Kbps 23.552 Kbps = 23552 bps 23352 — 28.75 stations The maximum number of stations is 28
